other_title: 恐竜大戦争アイゼンボーグ (Japanese)
plot: Japan is being besieged by evil Dinosaurs that humanity have long thought extinct, they are back and are creating disaster. To counter the threat, a special team of expert warriors called Aizenborg were created. Lamees and Kamal use their special powers to combine into Super Aizenborg to battle the evil Satola and his Dinosaur army.
